item.title: Welcome to my Github pages !
item.description: I am a PhD student in bioinformatics. I planned to build my Github pages since few times… Now, I managed to do it ! To do list add a Github logo in the top right corner with a link to my Github account move the light/dark mode button in the top right corner build a nice first page on the top, add two menus : vignettes and/or posts and/or other topics
